programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close – Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke – A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. “Ex” Clemens, (Nick Searcy – Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan – Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Crazy Rich Texans: The cowboys are deep in the heart of Texas! In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys try to cash in on a cattle bounty roundup: hard cash for each cow they catch. But this money ain't easy thanks to a sprawling 500-acre ranch covered in mesquite brush with razor-sharp thorns. Just when the cowboys think they've found a promising Texas cattle connection, Booger makes a big mistake that could jeopardize their first meeting with a hard-nosed rancher. Back in Alabama, Bubba and Kaley's house guest is beginning to overstay his welcome. As they try to teach Andrew the Thompson house rules, he commits the biggest cowboy sin of all — messing with Bubba's grill! Booger, Jaclyn, and Matthew care for a new-born calf. Misty has a special surprise for Cody. An offer to travel back to Texas for another cattle drive doesn't thrill the cowboys, but they begin to consider the networking potential and how it might make their cattle-trading dreams come true.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Cash Cows: First, the cowboys need to track down one of Bubba's most troublesome heifers before she can bust through his fence again. After briefly tending to business and family in Alabama, the guys head back to the Lone Star State to try and expand their network of contacts. Bubba, Cody, and Booger help their new friend Cash with a big Texas cattle drive in the hopes of both leading the herd to greener pastures and finding the big cattle deal they came west for. On the range they forge deeper bonds with their Texas counterparts, swapping cowboy stories around the campfire. But things take a turn for the worse when the herd overheats, and the creek they're all counting on has run dry as a bone. Back home, Jaclyn and Matthew are learning to love life on the ranch. Houseguest Andrew's disgusting habits have Kaley seeing red. And just as Misty gets back in the barrel-racing saddle, she starts to butt heads with her high-strung mare.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Showdown at the Arena: Only seven cowboys remain, eager for the chance to prove they can win it all. The immunity challenge examines each cowboy's patience and control in a point system challenge. The contestant with the highest score won't have to sweat the next elimination round. When it looks like it might come down to a tie, the last cowboy to ride prevails. In the two-part elimination challenge, the contestants must gather and load a herd into a trailer before racing off to a neighboring field where they must doctor a few yearlings in open pasture. The green team starts strong, but a few wrong moves have major repercussions. On the blue team, a cowboy takes the lead, curious to see if his teammate will sink or swim under pressure. The elimination comes down to two rivals who don't hold back when it comes to letting Trace know why the other should go home. In the end, Trace sends the cowboy whose heart doesn't seem to be in it to win it, but they don't go quietly.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: We head to arguably the most historic bass fishing location on the planet, Lake Eufaula! this place is known for big fish and is rich with history. This is the place where a lot of famous fishing lures were even created, including the deep diving crankbait and big worm. Anyways, it was a super fun tournament. I went fishing shallow and also played in some offshore brush. Watch it go down!

programme.title: Lunkerville

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: Stomping Grounds - "Carolina Flare: Netflix's Outer Banks
programme.desc: In this episode, we visit the coast of North Carolina where host Ryan McVinney meets up with filmmaker Jonas Pate and his family to discuss the real life inspiration behind his hit Netflix show Outer Banks. We learn about Carolina Skiffs and visit Grady-White in Greenville, then meet some professional boat cinematographers and local custom Carolina sport fishing yacht dealers. Finally we stop in Washington to reminisce about the early days of powerboat racing with champion Reggie Fountain, who regales viewers with tales of beating Don Johnson, Kurt Russell, Al Copeland and Chuck Norris while setting speed records and capturing the title of the fastest V-bottom boat in the world. From go-fast speed boats to family cruising we see some of what makes North Carolina's storied boating culture unique and special.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Way out with John B.
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Ocean's Edge Resort on Key West, Florida provide no shortage of beautiful fishing area. Capt Scot Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger meet up with good friend and commercial fisherman John Buckheim of Keys Fresh Seafood market to haul in some delicious sport fish.

programme.title: Spanish Fly
programme.desc: Boca Paila, Mexico

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures
programme.sub-title: Reel Life Adventures - "Reefs, Wrecks and Key Lime Pie
programme.desc: Kailey and Ashley Stockinger travel from SW Florida to Marathon in the Florida Keys to fish with Tucker and JC Carlson. After fishing, the group samples and rates some of the finest key lime pie in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: On Deck
programme.sub-title: On Deck" With Captain Cory McGuire
programme.desc: For someone like Capt. Cory who's out on the water most days of the year, it's easy to notice the little changes that show the stress on an ecosystem. Whether that's subtle movements of fish from lingering red tide blooms or large-scale impacts from high-volume Lak Okeechobee discharges, he sees it all, and he's ready for things to change. "I wish we would get to a point where we really put our foot down and do something about it before it's too late." Watch this episode to learn more about what's going on and to see why Capt. Cory is so passionate about fighting to protect the places he loves. Visit https://captainsforcleanwater.org to join the fight.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Every year I try to shoot my bow more and create real hunting scenarios. Off angle, tight shots, up hill, down hill, all in a way of training myself for every possible situation. This summer I had the opportunity to shoot several different 3D courses and not just shoot level in my backyard. I highly recommend hitting several courses even if they are local clubs in your area.

programme.title: Primal Divide

programme.title: Nursery Crime
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.

programme.title: Call for Help
programme.desc: With the pressure of Froy's legal problems mounting, the team does everything they can to convince him to hire a lawyer. Froy and Matt confront a misogynist frat boy with a dark secret, Sonia and Froy wrangle with a squadron of costumed rally racers, and Lou, Matt, and Froy get the surprise of a lifetime when they're faced with a truck-full of vicious gangsters.

programme.title: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret. And finally, the team's attempt to repo fifteen bikes from a gym is not the morale booster Lou had hoped for.

programme.title: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: While Froy waits on news from his lawyer about his warrant in Texas, he considers taking matters into his own hands. Lou and Froy bust some slick moves in an attempt to wrangle a car from a debtor who is prepared to battle. Then, when one woman behaves like a child, Matt puts her in timeout, but worries he may have gone too far. And finally, Lou, Matt, and Froy take on an jealous husband with deadly aim.

programme.title: Knife Week
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect the girls from two knife wielding debtors who will go to any lengths to keep their vehicles.

programme.title: Think, Adapt and Attack
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah and Sonia fight not only with them, but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working for a local repo team. Meanwhile, Lou decides to re-hire Frankie despite Sonia and Lyndah's objections, but first Lou wants to see how Frankie fares when faced with the temptation in the form of strippers and alcohol.

programme.title: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: Down in Texas, Matt and Froy are staking out a cement mixer, but their repo turns disastrous when an innocent bystander gets showered in concrete. In LA, Frankie takes the reins with an alcoholic debtor, and Lou and Sonia deal with a diva who pushes Sonia to her breaking point.

Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia. And finally, Matt and Froy face down a backwoods Texan with secret ammunition.

programme.title: Mess with Texas

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Italians are not big beef eaters. When they do indulge, it is rarely with steak…except in Florence, where Bistecca Fiorentina is a favorite. At 2” thick, grilled over coals, with a very special anchovy, rosemary and salt rub, it is served with braised cannellini beans. Caramelized tomatoes (yes!) over vanilla ice cream for dessert it's a rich and robust dessert after Bistecca!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Caesar Salad is a staple on the Italian-American table, even though it's origin in Mexican. Lidia's version is the best of both, and shows us why it is probably America's most popular salad. And who doesn't love Lasagna? Lidia's is classic Italian-American Lassgna steeped in her special meat sauce.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Sunday Ragu – the aromas of Ragu simmering starting early Sunday mornings waft through the courtyards of Lidia's home town, and remain firmly in her sensory memories. Paired with Rigatoni, Meatballs, Braciola di Manzo, and Broccoli Rabe with Oil and Garlic, Lidia's recipes carry her (and you) back to Italy.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia cooks her mother Erminia's and daughter and daughter Tanya's favorite“Italian-American” recipes: Bubbly hot, cheese-filled Manicotti and aromatic savory Spinach-Meat Cannelloni, served right from the oven in a sizzling old-style baking dish. On the side, Lidia's Italian “tri-colore” salad: Arugula, Tomato, Mozzarella.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Forget about the tomato sauce in this episode. Milan is the hub of Northern Italian cooking: Classic Veal Milanese, Lidia's Chicken Parmigiana, and a contemporary version of Veal Capricciosa, a bone-in veal chop, breaded and sauteed, and accompanied by two sides: an arugula-tomato-onion salad and a warm potato, caper and onion salad.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: “Eat the beans, they taste great, and they are good for you!” This is food at the heart of the Mediterranean diet. Pasta fagioli is a meal sized main course soup. Sausages are cooked with beans, then sliced and served separately. It yields a first course by taking beans from the soup and adding them to an escarole salad. Dessert is roasted pears and grapes, served with vanilla ice cream.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Eggplants are not all the same. Lidia choose and preps different eggplants, then demonstrates how to cook them. For eggplant parmigiana, a most popular Italian-American meatless dish, fried eggplant is layered with cheese and tomato sauce, then baked bubbling hot. For ziti alla nona (grandma's eggplant and pasta), a roasted eggplant, cubed, breaded then sautéed into the pasta.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: How long did it take for the chicken to cross the road? Well, if it was coming to Lidia's hous, even if it stopped for garlic mashed potatoes and spinach, it would still take less than 30 minutes to get to the table. Here Lidia teaches us how to cook three classic chicken scaloppina dishes, each in under 30 minutes and it's no riddle!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Filet mignon and chocolate – these don't sound like ingredients to top off a list of Italian-American recipes – but in the kitchen of Lidia Bastianich, it's “Tutti a tavola” to cook and savor two of our most sensual foods: Seared Filet Mignon with Italian style chunky braised vegetables, followed by a rich Hazelnut-Chocolate Ice Cream Truffle.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: A popular dish in Lidia's first restaurant in Queens, New York and still a favorite in her home today, Lidia shares her recipe for Veal Rollatini -- slices of veal rolled and baked until the cheeses ooze out of it. Lidia begins the meal with a classic spinach and bacon salad...and finishes it with sweet crunchy almond cookies for dessert.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Taste and flavor are as much about aromas, textures and story as they are about ingredients. Lidia aims to please all of our senses with this Roman meal fit for an emperor, but enjoyable by everyone, including Lidia's grandchildren. First course, or primi, is spaghetti with anchovies and bread crumbs, followed by pot-roasted herb-scented pork loin the final aromatic touch: braised fennel.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia shares her technique for making a basic marinara, enthusiastically immersing herself in sauce making Lidia's way. She then prepares two faorite pasta dishes: a seafood vermicelli with fresh clams and scallops and a parchment wrapped, baked ziti with mozzarella, marinara and fresh basil. Tutti a tavola! She commands, and we follow joyfully.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa
programme.desc: Some foods are sexy because of their texture or flavor, and some are sexy because of how they're served. These are the foods we'd cook for a very important evening. A lush seafood stew with scallops, shrimp, mussels, clams and Pernod, a whole-leaf Caesar salad made to be eaten with your fingers, and a silken Caramel Panna Cotta. We'll visit Greystone, one of the oldest buildings in the valley.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa
programme.desc: We take you along to the biggest charity event in the Napa Valley and then come back home to make some late-night favorites: a home-style onion soup, a spicy spaghetti Amatriciana, and dried-fruit compote flavored with Sambuca.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Adventurer Bear Grylls explores British adventures and the country's extreme landscapes. In episode two, Bear reveals the tropical past of the Yorkshire Dales while abseiling at Malham Cove.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Adventurer Bear Grylls explores British adventures and the country's extreme landscapes. Bear journeys from the deepest point in Britain to the highest peak in the Highlands.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Bear goes to North Wales, and the glorious mountains of Snowdonia, a landscape shaped by volcanic eruptions and shattering continental fractures. Bear starts his adventure by crossing Cardigan Bay, which at 50-miles wide is the largest bay in Wales.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Adventurer Bear Grylls explores British adventures and the country's extreme landscapes. In episode two, Bear reveals the tropical past of the Yorkshire Dales while abseiling at Malham Cove.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Adventurer Bear Grylls explores British adventures and the country's extreme landscapes. Bear journeys from the deepest point in Britain to the highest peak in the Highlands.

programme.title: For the Love of Bread
programme.desc: One of the world's oldest cities, Athens, has a long history of baking. Andrew meets the Greek bakers who are keeping the tradition of koulouri, souvlaki and sourdough alive.

programme.title: For the Love of Bread
programme.desc: Copenhagen is a global food capital where they take an almost academic approach to their cuisine. Andrew takes a tour of the city and witnesses first-hand the passion and dedication behind its bread and coffee.

programme.title: For the Love of Bread
programme.desc: For Parisians, bread and pastries are the heart of their culture. From pain au chocolate to sourdough croissants, Andrew meets the French bakers who represent the best of traditional French baking.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Starting Up Starting Over
programme.desc: Ben Fogle travels to the Malvern Hills area of Worcestershire to meet Hani and Sarah and explore their dream of owning and running their own beer brewery.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon touches down in Vietnam – he's never been here before but this nation are fearless foodies if it moves they eat it and every bit of it! On Gordon's travels he is wowed by legendary local restaurateur Mrs Duck who turns out to be the queen of beak to tail cooking, he loses his bottle when a 6 foot long snake complete with beating heart is served-up for dinner and finishes his week trying to impress Vietnam's pickiest foodies when he takes over a traditional restaurant and has his own Kitchen Nightmare.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon is going off the beaten track to Cambodia. After the years of Khmer Rouge rule and civil war the country was at year zero. Today the country is in recovery and the food is undergoing a revival. Gordon scours the country hunting out historic recipes that pre-date the Khmer Rouge rule. He hires a chopper to take him into the heart of the jungle where he discovers a dessert fit for a restaurant, he turns hunter gatherer wading through snake infested rivers on the hunt for a Cambodian favourite, frog and is on the trail of Cambodia's hairiest delicacy, tarantula!

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon is in Malaysia where he quickly learns it's the women and not the chefs that rule the kitchens. programme.desc: High-level corporate execs leave the comfort of their offices and secretly take low-level jobs within their companies to find out how things really work and what their employees truly think of them. This Emmy-winning reality series utilizes hidden cameras to provide an authentic view of executives' journeys as they are immersed in the day-to-day operations of their organizations. In the process of this undercover mission, they learn of the perceptions about their companies, the spirit of their work forces and -- maybe -- something about themselves as well.

programme.title: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Armed with the belief that he is now co-owner of the business, Matt starts making some big business calls - is this the beginning of a new chapter for the team, or the beginning of its undoing?

programme.title: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again. Then, Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah go undercover as college students to extract an extremely expensive bicycle from an extremely irate athlete. And finally, Lou and Froy head to church to repossess a van from a minister with a terrible problem.

programme.title: Heart Attack Panic
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck by a heart attack. Plus, a repo becomes violent under the watchful eye of the finance company. FSC_OperationRepo_S9E11_HD

programme.title: Tijuana Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy's business hits another snag when a gang of bat-wielding partiers keeps them away from a car and a paycheck. Then, Lou and Sonia wind up in the crosshairs when they attempt to repo a car from a man who appears to be a federal agent. And, with Matt and Froy's business in a complete shambles, they go to work in the only place that can save them Tijuana.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos a repo at a car wash gets out of hand Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shoot out.

programme.title: The Road to Recovery
programme.desc: On this premiere of Operation Repo's brand new season, Sonia's rehabilitation from her gunshot wound takes a shocking turn. The whole team runs into trouble on a job when they attempt to repossess a carnival ride from a group of wannabe carnies, Froy and Matt wrangle with a gym owner and his hired muscle, and Lou, Froy, and Sonia repo a truck from a protester in quite the revealing outfit.

programme.title: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car. And finally, Lou and Lyndah think they are going to repo a Chevy van from wounded veterans, but the veterans aren't what they seem.

programme.title: Native Operation
programme.desc: First, Matt and Lou confront an ungentlemanly drunk at an upscale gentleman's club in an effort to repossess his late model BMW. Then, Sonia and Matt head over to the wrong side of the tracks to reclaim a motorcycle from a different kind of biker. And finally, Matt and Froy cross the border into a nearby reservation to wrangle with a belligerent debtor and two unimpressed representatives of the tribal police.

programme.title: Playing the Role
programme.desc: First, Lou devises a plan to have Froy and Sonia pose as house buyers, and a happy married couple, meanwhile Matt and Lou will hook and book. Then, Matt and Froy wrangle with an out-of-work actor who's lost track of the line between his identity and his latest role. Finally, Froy and Lyndah need to figure out how to get a car from an angry owner, and the competing repo company that got to the job first.

programme.title: I Don't Know What That Is
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy crash a raucous brew-fest to sneak an ATV away from a crowd of tipsy revelers. Then, Matt and Lou come face-to-face with a fraternity prank gone awry - these college kids have a sledgehammer, and they're not afraid to use it. And finally, Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia take on the task of repossessing a Corolla from a woman with a bun in the oven and an axe to grind.

programme.title: Matt Vs. Sonia
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy respond to a tip from an informant and wind up in the middle of an epic story of intrigue, betrayal, and drunk girls fighting each other. Then, a high-class croquet party gets interrupted when Matt and Lou come through to repossess a Volkswagen And finally, it's a trip to a parking garage to repossess a stolen limo - with a gaggle of partiers in the back. Will Matt and Sonia be able to hook and book, or will they wind up at each others' throats?

programme.title: Revenge Gone Wrong
programme.desc: When Matt almost gets run down by a posse of graffiti-packing gangsters, he sets into motion a plan of revenge against Lyndah.

programme.title: Monster of a Problem
programme.desc: Lyndah and Matt confront a confused debtor who is as quick with his questions as he is with his knife. Then, Lou and Lyndah interrupt a seaside party to repo a motorboat away from a gaggle of misguided youths. And, Lou, Froy, and Sonia head to the dirt track to repossess a car from an event promoter. They seem to be able to reason with him, but his monster truck-driving brother with no respect for human life may prove to be a problem.

programme.title: Don't You Dare Lift-off
programme.desc: First, Froy, Matt, and Lou turn tail and bail when bats and guns are swung towards them. Later, things get heated for Matt and Sonia just before they head out with Esteban and Lou to ambush a helicopter pilot.

programme.title: Juro Que Te Amo Capítulo 120

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 23

programme.title: El Manantial Capítulo 24

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Jeff Shaw's writing is marked both by idealism and humanity. His stimulating satire is often infused with poetic beauty. More importantly, he looks like Rod Stewart.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Jay Stevens
programme.desc: Jay Stevens has been a professional comedian for almost 20 years. Growing up, he was known as a hilarious outgoing character by friends, family, colleagues and those he would meet on a first encounter.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Shawn Reynolds: Got Room For One More?
programme.desc: Shawn Reynolds is a nationally touring, clean comedian and funny dad of six who's not afraid to tell people he's also a trophy husband.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: David Harris is a nationally touring, regionally Emmy Award Winning comedian, magician, actor, and host. Harris has entertained North American audiences for over 20 years with over 2000 live performances to date. He regularly appears at clubs, colleges, corporate events, theaters, arts centers, alternative rooms and other top venues across the U.S. and Canada.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Former Gang Member, current comedian, future famous comedian. Shayne Smith is the runner up in the Wiseguys' 2015 Funniest Person In Utah competition, winner of the 2015 Salt City Comedy Superstar contest and most recently voted best Alternative Comedian of 2016 by City Weekly.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: With an array of impressions, stories, gestures and faces, Arvin's memorable performance is sure to please. As the former co-host of BET's Club Comic View, Arvin has been featured on Kevin Heart's “One Mic Stand”, Tony Rocks “The Funny Spot” as well as entertaining our troops abroad. Nominated as one of NBC's Stand Up for Diversity top comics Arvin continues to tour colleges, clubs, cruise ships & churches.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Tony Deyo is a stand-up comedian known most notably for his sharp, quick material and near-perfect comedic timing almost certainly gained from his years as a professional symphony musician. New York City's Village Voice calls him “one of the tightest joke writers in the business.” In 2013, he made his late night television debut on CONAN. Within a year, he had added appearances on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, AXS TV's Gotham Comedy Live, and Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen. His latest album, Comedy Road Trip, landed on the Billboard Magazine comedy chart and debuted as the #1 selling stand-up album on iTunes. With over 50 stand-up clips available, he has steadily become one of the most prolific comedians on YouTube. He performed at the prestigious HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, was named one of the year's best by the New York Post, and can be heard regularly on SiriusXM Satellite Radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Matt Knudsen was born in Hawaii, raised in the Mid-west and sailed around the world as a merchant marine. As an actor, Matt shared the big screen with Oscar winner Sean Penn in Gangster Squad, or you may also recognize him from his appearances in shows like Crazy Ex-Girlfriend, Key & Peele, Workaholics, The League, Big Love, Boston Legal or Malcolm in the Middle just to name a few. Matt has also been a part of several high profile commercial campaigns for companies including: Apple, IBM, GE, Volkswagen, DirecTV, Pepsi and more which have aired during the Superbowl and The Olympics. As a comedian, he's appeared on Conan, The Late Late Show, Last Call, ASX Live and Comics Unleashed, as well as dozens of festivals, including: Montreal Just for Laughs (Best of the Fest), The San Francisco Sketchfest, Bridgetown, High Plains, Limestone and has even entertained at The White House for President and Mrs. Obama.

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a ‘Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a ‘Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a ‘Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more ‘Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl In Town
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor – Merlok the Magician – has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend…MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the “ghost in the machine” she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party -Episode 2
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: Onyx Family | Sinead's Silly Spa!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: JillianTubeHD | Jillian vs. A Yeti!
programme.desc: Join YouTube star, JillianTubeHD, as she makes everything from delicious desserts to gold, glittery slime!

programme.title: KidCity | Family Blaster Battle!
programme.desc: Play along with the KidCity family —Little Flash, Ava, DadCity, and MomCity— in all their kid-friendly games!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Roblox Trouble!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: Challenge Squad | Slimy Games!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Evan's Food Fight!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Get Ready to Game!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: VIP Pets
programme.desc: We are the VIP Pets! The coolest pets with a passion for hair! We are best friends and together we will discover lots of beautiful hairstyles and go on exciting adventures!

programme.title: KikoRiki
programme.desc: Round shaped funny creatures live in a beautiful fairy-tale land of Kikoriki. Each of them has its own personality and each story teaches valuable lessons about cooperation, creativity, core values, self-acceptance, support and communication.

programme.title: TurboZaurs
programme.desc: The adventures of dinosaur's squad transforming into big machines who are willing to solve any difficulties that kids may face in their everyday life.

programme.title: Animal Jam
programme.desc: Just think, all your favorite furry friends together right here for one animal packed hour, including: “KikoRiki” “Pincode,“and “Talking Tom Heroes.”

programme.title: Tales of Tatonka
programme.desc: Share great laughs and thrilling adventures with Wanji, Nunpa, Yamni and Topa, four daring wolf-cubs. Our four heroes and their friends learn to grow together as a family and discover the world around them.

programme.title: Hogie the Globehopper
programme.desc: Hogie the Globehopper is a fun tv show that will inspire a curiosity and fascination about the world and its people. Hogie and his friends Lorna, Bernie and Floaty travel the world, making lots of friends along the way.

programme.title: Pirate school
programme.desc: On a small remote island surrounded by endless seas, a special Pirate School was opened, where children from pirate families study. Among them are Keel, Fuse and Bobo. The pirate origin does not relieve them from study and normal school duties.

programme.title: The Adventures of Peter and Wolf
programme.desc: A sitcom about the adventures of ordinary schoolboy Peter and talking Wolf connecting the world of people to parallel universes, where there live robots and vampires, werewolves and zombies, giants and aliens, fairies and centaurs, clones and invisible men! The characters will have to solve locals' problems and regularly save the world.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock' Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it's not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Angry Bird Toons
programme.desc: Check out Angry Birds Toons compilations! Each compilation has several episodes from your favorite shows including Angry Birds, Piggy Tales, and Stella!

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: The BFF's are a group of teenage friends that together will go through the most difficult situations and become best friends forever! Their adventures are full of hilarious moments, interrupted by a magical character who tries to spread bad vibrations.

programme.title: Drakers
programme.desc: Racing At High Speeds At All Times!

programme.title: I'll Get You! Holiday
programme.desc: The action takes place in all year round resort, where Wolf doesn't chase Hare to eat him anymore: now it's all about sports and competition. However, in his crazy chase after recognition and victories the grey hooligan often uses methods that aren't really fair, which provokes awkward and funny situations.

programme.title: Mr. Moon
programme.desc: You know Mr Moon. We all do. Just look out your window at night—there he is! Climbing up his ladder and taking his place in the star-studded indigo sky. But have you ever wondered what Mr Moon does when he's NOT shining down on us? Well, that, my friends, is where our story begins.

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit
programme.desc: Packed with adventure, fun and excitement, HORACI THE INUIT will transport you to the Lands of the North where, together with his best friend Sedna, he will have to solve all kinds of mysteries! Horaci the Inuit takes place in a remote village and talks about universal values such as caring for nature, being intuitive and open-minded and, above all, having a loving respect for family and friends!

programme.title: Pim & Pom at the Museum
programme.desc: Pim & Pom at the Museum: a preschool 2D animated series based on world famous works of art. Pim and Pom, two little cats, take the children on an adventure in the fascinating world of art. Featured artists include Seurat, Renoir and Malevitsch, Rembrandt, Vermeer and Van Gogh. Through the power of their imagination, they explore paintings by famous artists like Vincent van Gogh, Johannes Vermeer, Rembrandt, Seurat and Renoir. The paintings form the backdrop for all their adventures as these curious little cats (literally) dive into a different artwork in each episode. The animation series will be a first introduction to the visual arts for young children.

programme.title: Gus Plus Us
programme.desc: Gus, Karrot, and Lucy invite viewers to embark on melodious adventures fueled by curiosity and discovery.

programme.title: Mia
programme.desc: Mia is a curious and daring 6-year-old mouse who gets excited about everything! She wants to see, try and experience it all! With the help of her grandma, friends and neighbors, she discovers the amazing world around her.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock' Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it's not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit
programme.desc: Packed with adventure, fun and excitement, HORACI THE INUIT will transport you to the Lands of the North where, together with his best friend Sedna, he will have to solve all kinds of mysteries! Horaci the Inuit takes place in a remote village and talks about universal values such as caring for nature, being intuitive and open-minded and, above all, having a loving respect for family and friends!

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Reading books is wonderful, especially when you're sitting with a big cuddly Yeti. Nina and Leon, two little mice, are very lucky indeed as every day Yeti reads them a new book.

programme.desc: Will Leon beat Rock Baby in the hot pepper competition? Does Nari's secret sous-chef weapon help her win the cook off? And will Silly Burger be able to escape Rita's unquenchable thirst for his delici

programme.desc: After the post of Sonny and Julia singing on Wildzagram became viral, a famous personal manager of singers and performing artists approached the duo and offered to make them world famous.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff's ship docks in Le Havre and he explores the coast of France beginning with the ancient, towering icon of Mont St. Michel. Next, Jeff experiences escargot, a French favorite culinary tradition, and visits Utah Beach, the site of WWII's D-Day.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.sub-title: Haleakala: In the House of the Sun
programme.desc: Colton and Jack are on the island of Maui checking out Haleakala National Park.

programme.title: From Cubs To Kings
programme.desc: A packed beach in Spain. Thousands of miles from their native home of Africa, a pair of tiny, new-born lion cubs are posing for tourist snapshots. A heart-wrenching sight – they appear hollow-eyed, weak and malnourished. Acting on an anonymous tip, the cubs are impounded in a sanctuary where they undergo medical tests – and the results are grim. They have bacterial infections, bad kidney and liver function, hair loss, lice and an overall poor body condition. They are given the care they need, and they are given names: Yame and George, Now comes the big question: what is their future? Europe's zoos are already overpopulated with lions. Their lifesavers approach lion whisperer Kevin Richardson. Despite routinely turning down rescued cubs from the cub petting industry, he agrees to take in Yame and George. It is a lifelong commitment. But Richardson has a goal – to release them into his 1,000 hectare reserve in South Africa. Alongside Kevin Richardson, a team of dedicated veterinarians, scientists, rangers and volunteers work to ensure the cubs make it to adulthood – to one day experience a life of freedom in the land from which they came. From a miserable existence as a tourist sideshow in Spain to the wild plains of Africa – ‘From Cubs to Kings' follows two cubs on their journey to a better future.

George begins his exploration of the deep with a well-preserved shipwreck in the st.lawrence River, then heads west to dive with undersea explorers Chris Harvey-Clark and Phil Nuyyton, and investigate the newly discovered Black Smoker deepsea vents. The show climaxes in Curacao, where we dive to 1000 feet aboard Nuyytons newest submersible.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Crystal Cave

But it is a intensely difficult spot to explore with temperatures over 50 degrees C and humidity well over 100%. George leads an Explorers Club Flag Expedition into the cave, wearing special refrigerated suits and respirators to battle the extreme environment.
